results.title: John Muir National Historic Site Expansion Act
results.short_title: John Muir National Historic Site Expansion Act
results.committees: Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee
results.latest_major_action: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 60.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.) John Muir National Historic Site Expansion Act   (Sec. 3) The Department of the Interior may acquire by donation approximately 44 acres of land to include in the John Muir National Historic Site in Martinez, California.   The acquired land shall be administered as part of such site.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.) John Muir National Historic Site Expansion Act   (Sec. 3) The Department of the Interior may acquire by donation approximately 44 acres of land to include in the John Muir National Historic Site in Martinez, California.   The acquired land shall be administered as part of such site.

actions.description: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 60.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 115-47.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
